 2022-12632022-12-02TC,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActMotor Vehicle Safety Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Motor Vehicle Safety Regulations (Minimum Sound Requirements for Hybrid and Electric Vehicles)
PrecisRegulations Amending the MOTOR VEHICLE SAFETY REGULATIONS (MINIMUM SOUND REQUIREMENTS FOR HYBRID AND ELECTRIC VEHICLES) in order to introduce a requirement for newly manufactured or imported hybrid and electric light vehicles to meet minimum sound requirements at low speeds and maintain a minimum level of safety for pedestrians and pedal cyclists, including the blind and visually impaired.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0254 Publication Date: 2022-12-21
AttachmentsAttachment
